trait.name: Invigorating Field
entries: When a creature destroys a Convulsing Voidite with a melee attack, it regains 2 ({@dice 1d4}) hit points.

action.name: Distruptive Resonance
entries: A creature within 30 feet of the Convulsing Voidite must succeed on a {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw, or take 7 ({@damage 2d6}) Psychic damage and has the {@condition Poisoned|XPHB} condition until the end of its next turn. The Convulsing Voidite is destroyed at the end of its turn.

action.name: Explosive Undoing
entries: The Convulsing Voidite explodes, destroying itself. Any creature in a 20-foot radius of the Convulsing Voidite must make a {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed saving throw a creature takes 5 ({@damage 2d6}) Piercing damage, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Surprise Attack
entries: In the first round of combat, the Elven Brigand attacks against any creature with {@status Surprised|XPHB} condition are made with Advantage.

trait.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
entries: The elven brigand deals an extra 14 ({@dice 4d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the elven brigand (high elf) that does not has the {@condition Incapacitated} condition and the elven brigand doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

trait.name: Nimble Escape
entries: The elven brigand can take the {@action Disengage} or {@action Hide} action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: The elven brigand has advantage on saving throws against the  {@condition Charmed} condition, and magic can't put the elven brigand to sleep.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Elven Brigand makes 2 weapon attacks.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit +6} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Nimble Escape
entries: The elven brigand can take the {@action Disengage} or {@action Hide} action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: The elven brigand has advantage on saving throws against the  {@condition Charmed} condition, and magic can't put the elven brigand to sleep.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Elven Brigand makes 2 weapon attacks.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit +6} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit +6} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Volley
entries: The Elven Brigand fires a volley of arrow in a 30 foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw or take 10 ({@damage 4d4}) Piercing damage and its Speed is reduced by 10 feet until the start of the Elven Brigand's next turn. On a successful save a creature takes half as much damage and suffers no other effects.

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: The brigand captain has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put the brigand captain to sleep.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Brigand Captain makes 2 weapon attacks.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) Slashing damage. Two-Hand {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}).

action.name: Redeployment
entries: The Brigand Captain chooses an ally within 60 feet, and the ally immediately takes its turn in place of the Brigand Captain's turn.

bonus.name: Courageous Aspect (Recharges: Short or Long Rest)
entries: The Brigand Captain exudes a field of heroism for 1 minute. During this time, the Brigand Captain or any ally within 30 feet of the Brigand Captain is Immune to the {@condition Frightened|XPHB} condition.

trait.name: Evasion
entries: If the lictor is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, the lictor instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

trait.name: Assassinate
entries: During its first turn, the lictor has advantage on attack rolls against any creature that hasn't taken a turn. Any hit the lictor scores against a creature with {@status Surprised} condition is a critical hit.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d8 + 2}) slashing damage.

bonus.name: Invisibility
entries: The lictor magically give itself the {@condition Invisible} condition until it attacks or casts a spell, or until its {@status concentration} ends (as if {@status concentration||concentrating} on a spell).

trait.name: Crystaline Growth
entries: After the Rabble dies, a Convulsing Voidite grows out of its body the following round on the Rabble's Initiative. Any damage dealt to the Rabble body destroys it completely, causing no Convulsing Voidite to spawn.

action.name: Shamble
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h} 10 ({@damage 2d8 + 1}) Bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Implant
entries: The Rabble throws shards of crystals at creature within 15 feet of itself. The creature must succeed on a {@dc 11} Dexterity saving throw or is covered in crystals and takes 5 ({@damage 2d4}) radiant damage at the beginning of each of its turns for one minute or until the target creature or a creature within 5 feet of it takes an action to remove the seeds.

action.name: Regenerate (1/Short Rest)
entries: The Rabble regains 9 ({@dice 2d8}) hit points.
